description:
## Objective 
Add start and end margins to the `ClientActivity`

## Description
In the Client details page from the clients tab in the navigation drawer does not have the required start and end margin. This task is to add the required margin.

More details can be found on the following issue page  on GitHub:
https://github.com/openMF/android-client/issues/1191

## How to get help
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or  ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos).
name: Mifos Android Client: Add Margin to ClientActivity
